note.para: This section deals with the simple self check front end that comes with Evergreen. For information on setting up a SIP server for communicating with self check hardware, please refer to Setting up a SIP Server.

simplesect.title: Initializing the self check client.
simplesect.para: The selfcheck interface is run through a web browser. Before patrons can use the self check station, a staff member must initilize the interface by logging in.

step.para: Open a web browser and navigate to your self check interface page which is the location of the selfcheck.xml file. By default, the url will be https://[hostname]/opac/extras/selfcheck/selfcheck.xml, where [hostname] is your Evergreen host.
Login using a staff username or barcode and password.

simplesect.title: Using the interface to check out books
simplesect.para: After a staff user has logged into the self check interface, the interface should be ready for patrons to scan their barcodes and check out books.

step.para: Scan your patron barcode to login
Scan your books. The item titles should appear below the barcode field as you scan them.
Click Done when you are finished. This will print the reciept and log out.
Select printer to print a receipt (if a printer is available).

section.title: Customizing the Self Check Interface
section.para: The XML, CSS and JavaScript files for customizing the self check interface are located in the /openils/var/web/opac/extras/selfcheck/ directory.
